trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.
trans-unit.target: 表示为客户端应用程序服务的安全信息，包括角色信息。

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 验证客户端应用程序服务中的用户时<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>设置`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指向此类的实例的属性</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A><xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>类</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>的新实例属性</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>返回对象`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 你将不通常直接访问此类。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将调用<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>返回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>属性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a ClientRolePrincipal reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以强制转换<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>属性值设置为 ClientRolePrincipal 引用来调用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法显式，如示例部分中所示。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>属性的值初始化`identity`参数。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 验证客户端应用程序服务中的用户时<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>设置`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指向此类的实例的属性</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A><xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>类</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>的新实例属性</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>返回对象`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的安全标识<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 验证客户端应用程序服务中的用户时<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>设置`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指向此类的实例的属性</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>类</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>的新实例的标识属性</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化的标识属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>返回对象`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示的用户<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>是否属于指定角色。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将调用<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>返回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以强制转换<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>属性值设置为<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>显式，如示例部分中所示调用此方法的引用。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsInRole method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: IsInRole 方法将始终返回`false`如果用户登录名已过期。

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这不会发生如果你的应用程序调用<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法一次在身份验证之后很快。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序必须在其他时间检索用户角色，你可能想要添加代码以重新验证其登录名已过期的用户。

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有有效用户分配给角色，则可以确定登录名是否已通过调用过期<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: 如果不返回任何角色，登录名已过期。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关此功能的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此功能才是必需的如果选择了**要求用户重新登录每次服务器 cookie 到期时**在应用程序配置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的角色。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户是指定的角色;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果用户不属于指定角色，或者未经过身份验证。
